alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued January 19 at 7:40PM CST until January 21 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 18 to 20 expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Escambia, Mobile Inland, Baldwin Inland, Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. In Florida, Escambia Inland, Santa Rosa Inland and Okaloosa Inland Counties. * WHEN...From 9 PM Saturday to 9 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Inland; Escambia; Mobile Central; Mobile Inland
